Our History

Ehitech was established in 2015 by
Bldr Momoh Sunday Ehinomen and
started by doing Web design, Architectural
designs and home inspection within Nigeria
and is now working on being one of the
largest freelancer across the world.

Services

Ehitech specializes in building and remodelling
of Commercial buildings, carrying out Designs,
building inspections, land survey, remodelling
of homes. Referal services in Real -
Estate and interior designs.
